import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent{ public totalItem : number = 0; constructor (private cartService : CartService) {} ngOnInit(){ } }
